name: Easy Image Share
author: Kaitora

sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
1.4

  • Added the ability to prevent the plugin from working on specific pages/posts by adding [stop-eis] into the post

1.3

  • Added an admin menu to disable HTML or BB code textareas, this can also be used to disable both. It appears under the settings options.

1.2

  • Minor change to the image tag in the HTML textarea

1.1

  • Added Javascript to select all of the text on click

  • Changed the link URL to go to the URL of the blog.

1.0

  • Initial Release. Creates a textarea at the end of the post containing an image, so it can easily be shared. Creates HTML code and BB code versions.
sections.description:
Easy Image Share is a plugin that provides a sharing code for users at the end of a post that contains an image.

Readme Generator

This Readme file was generated using wp-readme, which generates readme files for WordPress Plugins.
